articles.description: As international cricket resumes for the first time since the March lockdown, here is a glimpse of what is going on behind the scenes.
articles.content:
Written by Rahul Sadhu
 | 
Updated: July 8, 2020 1:48:40 pm
England and West Indies will resume live cricket action at the Ageas Bowl on Wednesday. (AP Photo)International cricket will restart on … [+4620 chars]

articles.title: ‘Regret the fallout from it’: Former New Zealand coach Mike Hesson recalls toughest time of his coaching... - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Taylor stepped down from captaincy in all formats in 2012 after being asked to hand over the limited overs reigns to Brendon McCullum by Hesson, leading to quite a furore.”It was definitely the toughest time of my coaching career,” Hesson was quoted as saying…
articles.content: Former New Zealand coach Mike Hesson has conceded that the axing of Ross Taylor as captain in 2012 needed better handling but he has “no regrets” over the controversial call, which was the “toughest … [+2951 chars]
